formulas.name: AccountName
formulas.expression: IF( $Record.SalesOrder__r.Account__r.IsPersonAccount, $Record.SalesOrder__r.Account__r.FirstName & " " & $Record.SalesOrder__r.Account__r.LastName, $Record.SalesOrder__r.Account__r.Name )

formulas.name: DueARBody
formulas.expression: 'تستحق الدفعة الخاصة بك للوحدة ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + ' على القسط رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' بتاريخ ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + ''

formulas.name: DueARTitle
formulas.expression: 'اشعار بالدفع على ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' بالدفعة رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: DueBody
formulas.expression: 'Your payment for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' - Installment #' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' is due on ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + '.'

formulas.name: DueTitle
formulas.expression: 'Payment reminder for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: Installment1ARBody
formulas.expression: 'تستحق الدفعة الخاصة بك للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' على القسط رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' بتاريخ ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + ''

formulas.name: Installment1ARTitle
formulas.expression: 'استحقاق الدفعة رقم 1 للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ''

formulas.name: Installment1Body
formulas.expression: 'Payment Overdue! ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ', Installment #1 due since ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + '. Please address promptly'

formulas.name: Installment1Title
formulas.expression: 'Payment reminder for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: InstallmentDateARBody
formulas.expression: 'تم تغيير تاريخ الدفعة رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' إلى ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + ''

formulas.name: InstallmentDateARTitle
formulas.expression: 'تم تغيير تاريخ الدفعة رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ''

formulas.name: InstallmentDateBody
formulas.expression: 'Construction and payment milestone schedule has been updated for unit ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' in ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.Unit__r.Project__r.Name} + ''

formulas.name: InstallmentDateTitle
formulas.expression: 'Installment Date changed for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: InvoiceARBody
formulas.expression: 'تم فوترة الدفعة الخاصة بك للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' على القسط رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' بمبلغ ' + TEXT({!$Record.InvoicedAmount__c}) + ' ' + TEXT({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}) + ''

formulas.name: InvoiceARTitle
formulas.expression: ' فوترة الدفعة الخاصة بالوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' على القسط رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: InvoiceBody
formulas.expression: 'Your installment payment for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' on Installment #' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' of ' + TEXT({!$Record.InvoicedAmount__c}) + ' ' + TEXT({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}) + ' has been successfully billed.'

formulas.name: InvoiceTitle
formulas.expression: 'Payment is billed for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: OverdueARBody
formulas.expression: 'اشعار تأخير بالدفعة الخاصة بك للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' التي تم استحقاقها بتاريخ ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + ''

formulas.name: OverdueARTitle
formulas.expression: 'اشعار بالدفع على ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' بالدفعة رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: OverdueBody
formulas.expression: 'Reminder: Your payment for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' on Installment #' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' has been overdue since ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + '.'

formulas.name: OverdueTitle
formulas.expression: 'Payment reminder for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: ReminderARBody
formulas.expression: 'نود تذكيركم بأن القسط رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' للوحدة ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' سيتم استحقاقه بتاريخ ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + '. المبلغ المتبقي حاليًا هو ' + TEXT({!$Record.OutstandingAmount__c}) + ' ' + TEXT({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}) + ''

formulas.name: ReminderARTitle
formulas.expression: 'اشعار بالدفع على ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' بالدفعة رقم ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

formulas.name: ReminderBody
formulas.expression: 'We would like to remind you that Installment #' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c}) + ' for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' is due on ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentDate__c}) + '. The current outstanding amount stands at ' + TEXT({!$Record.OutstandingAmount__c}) + ' ' + TEXT({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}) + '.'

formulas.name: ReminderSubType
formulas.expression: If ({!$Record.InstallmentPayoutDate__c} != null && {!$Record.InstallmentPayoutDate__c} < TODAY(), 'Payment Due', 'Upcoming')

formulas.name: ReminderTitle
formulas.expression: 'Payment reminder for ' + {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.UnitNumber__c} + ' of Installment Number ' + TEXT({!$Record.InstallmentNumber__c})

Flow.interviewLabel: Installment Line Customer Notification Flow Trigger {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Installment Line Customer Notification / Reminder Flow Trigger

scheduledPaths.label: Run Before 15 min of Reminder Date

scheduledPaths.label: Run After 30 day of Installment date

scheduledPaths.name: Run_Before_30_day_of_Installment_date
scheduledPaths.label: Run Before 30 day of Installment date

scheduledPaths.label: Run After 10 day of Installment date
